StepStatus.description: The status of this approval step. Approved Fault Held NoResponse Pending Reassigned Rejected Removed Started If the approval step requires unanimous approval and one approver rejects the request, the value of this field for the other approvers changes to NoResponse. Likewise, if approval is based on the first response and an approver responds, the value of this field for the other approvers changes to NoResponse.
